item.title: SmartCapsLock
item.description: SmartCapsLock SmartCapsLock DON'T YOU GET ANNOYED WHEN YOU ACCIDENTALLY TYPE EVERYTHING WITH CAPS LOCK ON? SmartCapsLock lets you just select the text and press Caps Lock again to instantly fix the case instead of typing everything again. Download ╲╱ < Back to Kishan Bagaria Caps Lock Off. Caps Lock On. SmartCapsLock sits quietly in your menu bar and acts as an indicator always telling...

item.title: Show HN Karma for Hacker News
item.description: Show HN Karma is an userscript which appends the karma of HN users after their names. Installing the userscript Install an extension in your browser which lets you use userscripts: Chrome: Tampermonkey Firefox: Greasemonkey (you have to restart Firefox after installing Greasemonkey) Opera: Violentmonkey Click Show HN Karma and install the userscript. Load/reload Hacker News, you will now see the karma after usernames.

item.title: One Click Llama Button for DeviantArt
item.description: One Click Llama Button (OCLB) is a userscript (kinda like a browser extension) which adds a Llama button next to every deviant's name in DeviantArt pages. You just need to click this button once and it'll automatically give a Llama to that deviant. How To Install Exchangers List Preferences Comments on DeviantArt Contact Developer
